attributes.action: Force MP's to be honest their Pay, Expenses and Benefits, and to publish which family members are in their employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much has been written in the press recently about the pay, benefits and expenses of our MP's. I don't believe that downing street has provided enough assurances to the public. Prime Minister, please force (by legislation if necessary) our MP's (who we, "the Public", employ) to be honest about what they get out of the job and who they employ!

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
